ygData.subject: Amendment to North Qeynos Auction/Trade Show
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow Norrathians: I would like to make a small change in my previous message regarding the North Qeynos Auction/Trade show on the Bristlebane Server: When I
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow Norrathians:

I would like to make a small change in my previous message regarding
the North Qeynos Auction/Trade show on the Bristlebane Server:

When I said all good-aligned characters are invited, I meant all
characters that will not be attacked by the Qeynos City Guards.

Thank you.
Heidrich, Paladin of Qeynos
